name: Beetle Cafe
description:
Run a tiny café for beetles under the earth!

Manage a little cafe, tend to your customers, earn money, pay your rent, upgrade your café and more!

Instructions:
The game doesn't have a tutorial yet, so for now this will have to do.

1. Click on customers when they appear and click a table to seat them.
2. Once they've picked what they want, they'll raise their hand, click on them to take their order.
3. Wait for their order to be prepared, it'll appear in the bottom left corner, click it to select it and then click on the customer who asked for it.
4. Once the customer has finished eating, click on the table to clean it up and take the money.
5. Profit!

Coming to Android soon (Hopefully)!

NOTE: The game is still in development and there may still be some bugs and features yet to be added, stay tuned for more and contact us if you encounter an issue.
